visual_assets.name: blood vessel road
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the circulatory system as a pathway where fats travel.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon illustration of a curving blood vessel, like a road, reddish-pink

visual_assets.name: fat molecules traffic
visual_assets.purpose: Represents triglycerides, in excess, creating a 'traffic jam'.
visual_assets.prompt: many small, simple yellow circular fat molecules, like tiny cars, appearing congested in a line

visual_assets.name: inflamed pancreas
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the pancreas suffering from inflammation (acute pancreatitis).
visual_assets.prompt: minimalistic flat cartoon icon of a pancreas organ, red and slightly jagged outline to indicate inflammation

visual_assets.name: LPL enzyme
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the LPL enzyme, which breaks down triglycerides.
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon icon of a simple enzyme shape, light green, with a subtle internal gear or action symbol

visual_assets.name: triglyceride molecule
visual_assets.purpose: Represents a fat molecule to be broken down by LPL.
visual_assets.prompt: minimalistic icon of a simple rounded fat molecule, yellow color, flat style

visual_assets.name: ANGPTL3 brake
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the ANGPTL3 protein, which inhibits LPL activity.
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon icon of a 'brake' pedal symbol or a stop sign shape, red color, representing inhibition, minimalistic

visual_assets.name: evinacumab medicine
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the evinacumab drug, which blocks the ANGPTL3 'brake'.
visual_assets.prompt: minimalistic icon of a medicine molecule, small rounded capsule shape, blue color, flat style

visual_assets.name: healthy active person
visual_assets.purpose: Represents improved patient health and well-being after treatment.
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon illustration of a smiling, active person, simple and energetic pose, calm colors

visual_assets.name: clear blood vessel
visual_assets.purpose: Symbolizes healthy, unobstructed blood flow due to lower triglycerides.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon illustration of a clear, open blood vessel with smooth flow, light pink color

visual_assets.name: calm pancreas
visual_assets.prompt: minimalistic flat cartoon icon of a pancreas organ, light green or blue, smooth and calm outline

visual_assets.name: upward trend arrow
visual_assets.purpose: Indicates positive progress, reduced risk of pancreatitis, or improved health outcome.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat icon of a thick upward-pointing arrow or graph trend line, green color, indicating positive direction
